item.title: Rev:1055240 [vprus] - Revert removal of s_appRunning. This change brok...
item.author: vprus@k_d_e_v_e_l_o_p.org
item.description:
Revert removal of s_appRunning. This change broke adding breakpoints while application is running, and had other bugs. The ideal solution is to add support for non-stop mode, including keeping per-thread 'running' state and automatically picking a suitable thread to use for inserting breakpoint. However, such changes are too big, and we're in feature freeze.

(Fri, 27 Nov 2009 16:57:39 GMT)

Modified  /trunk/KDE/kdevelop/debuggers/gdb/gdbglobal.h
Modified  /trunk/KDE/kdevelop/debuggers/gdb/debugsession.cpp
